00021 
00022 #include "TestApplLayer.h"
00023 
00024 #include "NetwControlInfo.h"
00025 #include "SimpleAddress.h"
00026 #include "ApplPkt_m.h"
00027 
00028 using std::endl;
00029 
00030 TestApplLayer::TestApplLayer()
00031   : BaseApplLayer()
00032   , delayTimer(NULL)
00033   , coreDebug(false)
00034 {}
00035 
00044 void TestApplLayer::initialize(int stage)
00045 {
00046     BaseApplLayer::initialize(stage);
00047     if(stage == 0) {
00048       hasPar("coreDebug") ? coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue() : coreDebug = false;
00049         delayTimer = new cMessage( "delay-timer", SEND_BROADCAST_TIMER );
00050     }
00051     else if(stage==1) {
00052         scheduleAt(simTime() + dblrand() * 10, delayTimer);
00053     }
00054 }
00055 
00063 void TestApplLayer::handleLowerMsg( cMessage* msg )
00064 {
00065     ApplPkt *m;
00066     switch( msg->getKind() ){
00067     case BROADCAST_MESSAGE:
00068         m = static_cast<ApplPkt *>(msg);
00069         coreEV << "Received a broadcast packet from host["<<m->getSrcAddr()<<"] -> sending reply" << endl;
00070         sendReply(m);
00071         break;
00072     case BROADCAST_REPLY_MESSAGE:
00073         m = static_cast<ApplPkt *>(msg);
00074         coreEV << "Received reply from host["<<m->getSrcAddr()<<"]; delete msg" << endl;
00075         delete msg;
00076   break;
00077     default:
00078       EV <<"Error! got packet with unknown kind: " << msg->getKind()<<endl;
00079         delete msg;
00080         break;
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00092 void TestApplLayer::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg) {
00093     switch( msg->getKind() ){
00094     case SEND_BROADCAST_TIMER:
00095         sendBroadcast();
00096     delete msg;
00097     delayTimer = NULL;
00098   break;
00099     default:
00100       EV << "Unknown selfmessage! -> delete, kind: "<<msg->getKind() <<endl;
00101       delete msg;
00102       break;
00103     }
00104 }
00105 
00110 void TestApplLayer::sendBroadcast()
00111 {
00112     ApplPkt *pkt = new ApplPkt("BROADCAST_MESSAGE", BROADCAST_MESSAGE);
00113     pkt->setDestAddr(LAddress::L3BROADCAST);
00114     // we use the host modules getIndex() as a appl address
00115     pkt->setSrcAddr( myApplAddr() );
00116     pkt->setBitLength(headerLength);
00117 
00118     // set the control info to tell the network layer the layer 3
00119     // address;
00120     NetwControlInfo::setControlInfo(pkt, LAddress::L3BROADCAST );
00121 
00122     coreEV << "Sending broadcast packet!" << endl;
00123     sendDown( pkt );
00124 }
00125 
00126 void TestApplLayer::sendReply(ApplPkt *msg)
00127 {
00128     simtime_t delay;
00129 
00130     delay = uniform(0, 0.01);
00131 
00132     msg->setDestAddr(msg->getSrcAddr());
00133     msg->setSrcAddr (myApplAddr() );
00134     msg->setKind(BROADCAST_REPLY_MESSAGE);
00135     msg->setName("BROADCAST_REPLY_MESSAGE");
00136     sendDelayedDown(msg, delay);
00137 
00138     coreEV << "sent message with delay " << delay << endl;
00139 
00140     //NOTE: the NetwControl info was already ste by the network layer
00141     //and stays the same
00142 }
00143 
00144 TestApplLayer::~TestApplLayer()
00145 {
00146   cancelAndDelete(delayTimer);
00147 }
